data.title: Sklep muzyczny Supersound
data.meta_description:
Upgrade from Omnisphere to Omnisphere 2
Omnisphere 2 - Time to Make Some Noise!
Omnisphere is the flagship synthesizer
data.text:
A consumer, who has purchased the goods in our store, has 30 days to return the purchased product from the date of its receipt for any reason. If the object of purchase does not meet your expectations, you can return it without any problems and you get your money back!

ATTENTION: after receiving the digital license, the consumer loses the right to withdraw from the purchase contract, in accordance with the Law on Consumer Rights of May 30, 2014. (Journal of Laws 2014 item 827).

Find our more about returns: https://supersound.pl/eu/returns

All products sold by Supersound are covered by the manufacturerâ€™s warranty and effective period of that warranty is stated on the product site. In case of finding any defect in product purchased from us, please contact the nearest manufacturer service centre. In case of any problems, please contact us at the following e-mail address: serwis@supersound.pl

When making a purchase for an amount equal to or exceeding 250 EUR, you do not pay for shipping. We make every effort to ensure that shipped product is always adequately protected / packaged. Moreover, we want to reduce the delivery time to a minimum, so we cooperate only with the proven courier companies. From the moment of sending, the shipment should be in a destination place within 48 hours.

Despite this, our customer should check the consignment during the receipt of the consignment from the courier (the presence the courier is important) for possible damaging the package, and in case of finding such a failure, they ought to write down an appropriate protocol. The protocol is the basis for obtaining compensation

PayPal

We use a PayPal platform. It enables express electronic payments. We accept payment by most major credit or debit cards: VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Diners Club, JCB, POLCARD and many others.

Bank Transfer - payment in advance (EUR)

With payment in advance your order will be dispatched, as soon as the outstanding order amount is received. You will receive an order confirmation detailling our bank account information. Important: Please ensure to quote your order number in the subject line of the payment.

Cash on delivery

Currently only in stationary trade. We are working to enable payment on collection on delivery.
